core.tut.pori.http

Class JSONResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.http.Response
      • core.tut.pori.http.JSONResponse

  • public class JSONResponse
extends Response
    Response object that supports JSON output. Note that you MUST use this class if you plan to use JSON output, the ResponseData is one you should use if you need XML output.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class core.tut.pori.http.Response

    • Method Detail

      • writeTo

        public void writeTo(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        This method replaces the default XML/JAXB output with JSON using GSON annotations and sets content type to application/json. These to parameters should be changed for the response if format is changed in the overriding method. Additionally this method sets the HTTP basic authentication header if the status is set Response.Status.UNAUTHORIZED.
        Overrides:
        writeTo in class Response
        Parameters:
        response -
        See Also:
        Response.setDefaultAuthenticationHeader(HttpServletResponse), Response.setStatus(core.tut.pori.http.Response.Status)
